scripts.bundle:ios: node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --entry-file example.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/test --dev=false --verbose
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir android/app/src/main/assets; node ./node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --entry-file example.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/main.jsbundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --dev=false --verbose
